extendedInfo.description: Rakhi - brother and sister: Raksha Bandhan is celebrated for the caring relation between a brother and sister. Raksha Bandhan also termed "rakhi day". On the occasion of rakhi sisters tie a thread on the wrist of brothers.  The thread comes in various designs and is named as Rakhi in Hindu terminology. The sister perform the rituals of rakhi and pray for the prosperity and good health of their brothers.The bother in-turn promises to protect his beloved sister for whole life. Keeping the lovely relationship in the form of e-cards this android app is designed. Send lovely e-cards to your brothers and sisters. Download the app and send wishes on this rakhi.About Rakhi - brother and sister app:  â¢	The app has few traditionally designed and beautiful wallpapers with rakhi and lovely messages on it.â¢	These rakhi images can be used as wallpapersâ¢	User can send these e-cards on whatsapp. Also can be shared on facebook.â¢	Share the lovely rakhi cards and wish your brothers and sisters on the rakhi 2013Keywords: rakhi, raksha bandhan, e-cards, rakhi wallpaper, greetings on rakhi
